welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Walker, a charming city known for its natural beauty and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gerald R. Ford International Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options for passengers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and offers a variety of amenities, including duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Park Township Airport provides a variety of amenities for travelers, including shops, restaurants, and comfortable waiting areas.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Park Township Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for its passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Muskegon Airport serves all domestic flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
